knimeNode.name: Document Viewer (JavaScript)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Visualizes document terms and tags using the Brat JS library.

fullDescription.intro:
This node visualizes terms and tags of a document using the Brat JS library. Each term will be highlighted and its corresponding tags will be displayed above it. The highlighting colors are static depending on the tags.
Note: Only the document in the first row will be displayed.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the documents to show.

knimeNode.interactiveView: Displays the visualization of the document terms and tags.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the documents.
ports.outPort: Data table containing the input data appended with a column, that represents the selection made in the document viewer.
